data.title: New Creation Church
data.meta_description: We believe we are God’s beloved and He demonstrated this by freely giving up heaven’s best, His only Son Jesus, for you and me. When we catch a revelation of this truth, we are transformed by His grace from the inside out. That’s the beauty of believing and living in our heavenly Father’s love and grace! No matter who you are or where you come from, there’s always a place for you in our church family!
data.text:
By MRT

MBS is linked directly to Bayfront MRT station along the Circle Line Extension and Downtown Line. Head towards Marina Bay and get off at Bayfront MRT station. Use Exit D to leave the station and enter MBS. Take the escalators from Basement 2 to the concierge on Level 1. From there, take the escalators to the ballrooms on Level 3 or 4.

By Car

The car park is accessible via Bayfront Link or Sheares Link. Take the lift to Level 1 and head toward the Sands Expo and Convention Center. For more details on parking locations and rates, visit Marina Bay Sands website.

Please approach our ambassadors (in green T-shirts) to get a special parking coupon after the service for a flat-rate $8.56 parking fee. This coupon is applicable only for parking on Sundays, 7am–7pm. Please note that normal parking rates apply if you park outside this stipulated timing.

Alternative parking close to MBS is located at:

Marina Bay Financial Centre

Marina Bay Financial Centre is within walking distance of MBS. From here, you can choose to walk toward MBS along the bay or board the MRT along the Downtown Line and alight at Bayfront MRT – just one stop away.

Suntec City Mall

Suntec City Mall is located next to Promenade and Esplanade MRT stations. If you park there, board the train travelling towards Marina Bay along the Circle Line Extension and alight at Bayfront MRT.

Marina Square Shopping Mall

Marina Square Shopping Mall is connected to Esplanade MRT station via the CityLink Mall. You can take a short walk to Esplanade MRT station and board the train travelling towards Marina Bay along the Circle Line Extension to Bayfront MRT.
